blocks.content_html:
Navigation

Unreal Engine C++ API Reference > Runtime > RenderCore

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • FRDGScopeState
  • FRDGBuilder

References

   
Module RenderCore
Header /Engine/Source/Runtime/RenderCore/Public/RenderGraphBuilder.h
Include #include "RenderGraphBuilder.h"

Syntax

class FRDGBuilder : public FRDGScopeState

Remarks

Use the render graph builder to build up a graph of passes and then call Execute() to process them. Resource barriers and lifetimes are derived from RDG parameters in the pass parameter struct provided to each AddPass call. The resulting graph is compiled, culled, and executed in Execute(). The builder should be created on the stack and executed prior to destruction.

Variables

  Type Name Description
bool bEnabled  
FRDGBlackboard Blackboard The blackboard used to hold common data tied to the graph lifetime.
FRDGAllocator Root Allocator for all root graph allocations on the graph builder thread.
FRDGAllocator Task Allocator for async pass and parallel execute setup.
TStaticArray< TArray< UE::Tasks::FTask, FRDGArrayAllocator >,(int32) ERDGSetupTaskWaitPoint::MAX > Tasks Array of all tasks for variants of AddSetupTask.
FRDGAllocator Transition Allocator for all allocations related to states / transitions.
